text: To all our colleagues. We've heard the jokes going round. You'll never know but we're glad to have brought some laughter at this time.
But we are assured & comforted that those taking over will not identify us to the media. We asked to remain unknown & they have promised.
It's too easy to expose ourselves & enjoy the 30 minutes of applause before the eventual repercussions. We haven't slept much this week.
The individuals taking over come from various countries
column4: but all have a science background & are fearful about a Trump administration.

text: We'd like to thank the anonymous members of the Reddit community who helped us get the ball rolling & assist with a safe transfer of control
As such
column4: we are handing control of this account over to several activists & journalists who believe they can continue in the same spirit.

text: They haven't won & we haven't lost.
column4: & you have proven that this country believes in the serious work undertaken by our scientists.
